subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson made a 35-foot birdie putt on the 15th hole and a tap-in birdie on No. 18 for a four-under-par 68 and a two-stroke lead over Ross Fisher in the HSBC Champions tournament in Shanghai.
snippet: Phil Mickelson made a 35-foot birdie putt on the 15th hole and a tap-in birdie on No. 18 for a four-under-par 68 and a two-stroke lead over Ross Fisher in the HSBC Champions tournament in Shanghai.
